function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent evidence on the effects of outdoor green spaces on psychological and mental health","Impact":"Difficulty in determining the impact of green spaces on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Standardizing evaluation methods and tools for assessing the impact of green spaces on mental health","Technologies":"Data analytics, remote sensing, and GIS technology for evaluating green spaces","People":"General population, especially those living in urban areas","Owner":"Researchers, urban planners, and public health officials"},{"Description":"Limited studies on the effect of green spaces on mental health when access to public residential green spaces is not allowed","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the impact of restricted access to green spaces on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Conducting research on the psychological effects of restricted access to green spaces using alternative measures like the Green View Index","Technologies":"Remote sensing, GIS technology, and psychological assessment tools","People":"Individuals affected by restricted access to green spaces","Owner":"Public health officials, urban planners, and researchers"}]}
